trait.name: Raking Charge
text: If the kavu moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the kavu can make one rend attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Rend
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. 23 (4d8 + 5) slashing damage.
